title: Salvadorian Roast Turkey
ingredients: ['10 large plum tomatoes, halved and seeded', '1 large green pepper, halved and seeded', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 (4.5kg) whole turkey, neck and giblets removed', '1 Granny Smith apple, peeled, quartered and cored', '75g pitted green olives, drained', '2 dried ancho chillies, stemmed and seeded', '70g raw pumpkin seeds', '2 bay leaves', '1 onion, cut into chunks', 'salt and pepper to taste']
